Posts.Content: Hello ISantana I reciently finished my 6 quimios and still with that concern... I went to a few oncologyst here in my country (Ecuador) and all they said I should take that hormotherapy treatment (so far I dont know if is tamoxifen)... but honestly I dont feel that secure that will decrease a big chance of reapareance the cancer. Talking about your family ovarian cancer, for you can be sure if you have a high riskÂ  (or you are guessing)theres an exam you can take (it is expensive but woth it i think) the genetic test, with that you have the real information of haveing cancer genetic inherited. Im totally disagree to take a pill which in a future can damage my other organs.. :( but so far still like you searching for a light in this topic. Good luck for you too and if you have any new or if you decided to take it, please tell me the symtoms you feel God bless you Irma
Posts.Title: Hormonal therapy for young breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hello In april of this year i had been diagnostic with breast cancer, im a latina with 28 years old. They made me a radical mastectomy and and the patology said it was in second histological grade (1.8 cm size of tumor and 1/16 ganglia infected. Strogen receptor 80% positive Pregesterone receptor 80% positive KI 67 10% positive in tumor cells HER2 NEU negative My oncologist told me i will recieve 6 Quimios and an hormonal therapy during 5 years. My question is: That hormonal therapy it will induce me to a menopause. Who had this therapy, please tell me the effects or havoc in the body. I also would like to know someone who denied to continue this treatment (hormonal treatment) and if this affects in a reappearance of the cancer. Thank you
Posts.Title: Hormonal therapy for young breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Im very sorry to heard about that, I just can say trust in God, he had cure so many people from this situation and Im sure he will still do it over and over again. I wont deny Im afraid of the symtoms because i cant even take a bith control pill without feeling all the symtoms... With that i cant imagine how i would be with this hormonal therapy. I hope hear news from you too, hoping from all my heart all things gets better. Greetings Irma
Posts.Title: Hormonal therapy for young breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Im Irma i was diagnostic with breast cancer this year in april im 29 now. I reciently finish my 6 quimio. Do you need any information? Just let me know Irma
